data.text: @boodad12 @SMCHealth @RepSpeier @sanmateoco Don't have that answer, but out of respect for the hospital, it was decided we would wear masks.
@SanMateoPD @SMCHealth @RepSpeier @sanmateoco So does that include the parking structure to?  Is there a definition of healthcare setting somewhere?
@boodad12 @SMCHealth @RepSpeier @sanmateoco Regardless of being outside, the hospital is a healthcare setting.
@SMCHealth @RepSpeier @SanMateoPD @sanmateoco Why is everyone wearing masks(cloth masks no less) outside?

@SMCHealth @RepSpeier @SanMateoPD @sanmateoco Has anybody been to Physical Therapy Appointment lately? I have and people in the office and clients are in there not wearing a mask and I ask them why and they say oh well they’re not a healthcare facility. Why is this so difficult for y’all to figure out that? @JenSiebelNewsom
@SMCHealth @RepSpeier @SanMateoPD @sanmateoco Why are you all wearing masks outside, you look ridiculous.

@SMCHealth @RepSpeier @sanmateoco We are grateful for the numerous other public safety agencies that were able to join us today. We were glad to provide this small show of support to our county health care workers.
